name: Peanut Butter Sauce Chicken
author: Rita's treats
summary: An invention of mine to make use of some leftover chicken breasts. Its ingredients mainly belong to the Far-Eastern cuisine, but it also has a slight Latin twist and a Lebanese hint! ENJOY
ingredients: 2  cooked, boneless chicken breast halves, diced
directions: Heat the sesame oil in a skillet over medium heat
Stir in the garlic and salt
Cook and stir 1 minute, then stir in the pine nuts, and cook until golden, about 5 minutes
Add the diced chicken breast, and cook a few minutes to reheat
Stir in the peanut butter, soy sauce, and jalapeno pepper until the peanut butter has melted
Pour in the water, and bring to a simmer
Cook and stir until the sauce has thickened, about 5 minutes more
